caption.p: Scatter plot of BCP% and yield% of plant species present in the Belfrit list. The yield axis is scaled as a power of 0.2 in order to evidence species with yields ranging from 0.02 to 8.6%. 1, Pinus pinaster Aiton; 2, Ocimum tenuiflorum L.; 3, Aegle marmelos (L.) Corr.; 4, Protium heptaphyllum (Aubl.) March.; 5, Artemisia verlotiorum Lam rinus officinalis L.; 6, Annona squamosa L.; 7, Cannabis sativa L.; 8, Centella asiatica L.; 9, Annona muricata L.; 10, Rosmarinus officinalis L; 11, Perilla frutescens var. japonica (Hassk.) H. Hara.
